name: Somewhere (Original Demo)
lyric:
Break a silence for a while
And watching those cars passing like stars
Lighting not my cigarette end

And Broke heart broken the world is

Upon night and think about nothing

Where I'm from where I'm going
It doesn't matter cause no one cares
Just heart broken the world is

I'm taking you somewhere
where no one can find us
No more feeling empty No more sorry

I'm taking you somewhere
We'll be holding forever
To talk takes a smoke like a glory

I'm taking you somewhere
where no one can find us
No more feeling empty No more sorry
I'm taking you somewhere
We'll be holding forever
To talk takes a smoke like a glory
I'm taking you somewhere
There no one come to fader
The watch love emput for the sony
